repository.name: playwright
repository.description: Playwright is a framework for Web Testing and Automation. It allows testing Chromium, Firefox and WebKit with a single API.

body: Fix landed as https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/5748510, should go into Chromium 129.

issue.title: fix(chromium): allow PlzDedicatedWorker

issue.body:
With the recent Chromium fixes in v129, it is now safe to enable this feature.

Fixes #31747.

issue.title: fix(chromium): disable PlzDedicatedWorker again
